channel.title: CVE Feed for Calendar_plugin -- Calendar_plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Calendar_plugin -- Calendar_plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-34667|2024-08-04T00:19:47.755Z -- calendar_plugin -- calendar_plugin
item.description: The Calendar_plugin WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of `$_SERVER['PHP_SELF']` in the ~/calendar.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
